archimate:Requirement.name: SG.2.2.5b: b) determining the risks that need to be addressed to ensure the programme can achieve its intended outcome(s); prevent, or reduce, undesired effects; and achieve continual improvement
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
